00016 CSprite::CSprite() :
00017 m_surface(NULL),
00018 m_masksurface(NULL)
00019 {
00020  m_xsize = m_ysize = 0;
00021  m_bboxX1 = m_bboxY1 = 0;
00022  m_bboxX2 = m_bboxY2 = 0;

00029 bool CSprite::createSurface(Uint32 flags, SDL_Color *Palette)
00030 {
00031  if(m_surface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_surface);
00032  m_surface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface( flags, m_xsize, m_ysize, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00033  SDL_SetColors( m_surface, Palette, 0, 255);
00034  SDL_SetColorKey( m_surface, SDL_SRCCOLORKEY, COLORKEY ); // One black is the color key. There is another black, as normal color
00035  if(m_masksurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_masksurface);
00036  m_masksurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface( flags, m_xsize, m_ysize, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00037  SDL_SetColors( m_masksurface, Palette, 0, 255);
00038  SDL_SetColorKey( m_masksurface, SDL_SRCCOLORKEY, COLORKEY ); // color key.
00039  
00040  return ( !m_surface && !m_masksurface );
00041 }

00043 bool CSprite::optimizeSurface()
00044 {
00045  if(m_surface)
00046  {
00047   SDL_Surface *temp_surface;
00048   temp_surface = SDL_DisplayFormatAlpha(m_surface);
00049   SDL_FreeSurface(m_surface);
00050   m_surface = temp_surface;
00051         return true;
00052  }
00053  else
00054         return false;
00055 }
00056 
00057 bool CSprite::loadHQSprite( const std::string& filename )
00058 {
00059  if(m_surface)
00060  {
00061   SDL_Surface *temp_surface = SDL_LoadBMP(GetFullFileName(filename).c_str());
00062   if(temp_surface)
00063   {
00064    SDL_Surface *displaysurface = SDL_ConvertSurface(temp_surface, m_surface->format, m_surface->flags);
00065    readMask(displaysurface);
00066    readBBox(displaysurface);
00067    SDL_BlitSurface(displaysurface, NULL, m_surface, NULL);
00068    SDL_FreeSurface(displaysurface);
00069    SDL_FreeSurface(temp_surface);
00070    return true;
00071   }
00072  }
00073  return false;
00074 }
00075 
00076 /**
00077  * \brief Reads the mask of a created modkeen style bitmap und converts that mask to 8-bit
00078  *     so it can be applied to the others. This is for HQ Sprites, the other have in internal algorithm
00079  */
00080 void CSprite::readMask(SDL_Surface *displaysurface)
00081 {
00082  Uint8 *maskpx, *pixel;
00083  Uint32 color = 0;
00084  Uint8 mask = 0;
00085  Uint8 r,g,b,a;
00086  Uint16 h,w;
00087 
00088  h = displaysurface->h;
00089  w = (displaysurface->w)/3;
00090 
00091  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(displaysurface)) SDL_LockSurface(displaysurface);
00092  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_masksurface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_masksurface);
00093 
00094  maskpx = (Uint8*)m_masksurface->pixels;
00095  pixel = (Uint8*)displaysurface->pixels + (displaysurface->w/3)*displaysurface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00096 
00097  for( Uint8 y=0 ; y<h ; y++ )
00098  {
00099   for( Uint8 x=0 ; x<w ; x++ )
00100   {
00101    memcpy( &color, pixel, displaysurface->format->BytesPerPixel );
00102 
00103    SDL_GetRGBA( color, displaysurface->format, &r, &g, &b, &a );
00104 
00105    Uint32 mask32 = (r+g+b)/(3*16);
00106    mask = 15-mask32;
00107    //mask = 15;
00108 
00109    memcpy( maskpx, &mask, 1 );
00110 
00111    pixel += m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00112    maskpx += m_masksurface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00113   }
00114   pixel += 2*w*m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00115  }
00116  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_masksurface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_masksurface);
00117  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(displaysurface)) SDL_LockSurface(displaysurface);
00118 }

00125  // TODO: That code need to be implemented

00128 void CSprite::applyTransparency()
00129 {
00130  Uint8 *pixel;
00131  Uint8 *maskpx;
00132  Uint32 colour, mask;
00133  Uint8 r,g,b,a;
00134  
00135  if(!m_surface) return;
00136 
00137  if(m_surface->format->BitsPerPixel == 8) // In case we did not call SDL_Displayformat
00138  {
00139   SDL_BlitSurface(m_masksurface, NULL, m_surface, NULL);
00140   return;
00141  }
00142  
00143  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_surface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_surface);
00144  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_masksurface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_masksurface);
00145  
00146  pixel = (Uint8*)m_surface->pixels;
00147  maskpx = (Uint8*)m_masksurface->pixels;
00148  
00149  for( Uint8 y=0 ; y<m_ysize ; y++ )
00150  {
00151   for( Uint8 x=0 ; x<m_xsize ; x++ )
00152   {
00153    memcpy( &colour, pixel, m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel );
00154    memcpy( &mask, pixel, m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel );
00155    
00156    SDL_GetRGBA( colour, m_surface->format, &r, &g, &b, &a );
00157 
00158    if(*maskpx<16)
00159     a = (255*(*maskpx))/15;
00160    else a = 255;
00161 
00162    colour = SDL_MapRGBA( m_surface->format, r, g, b, a );
00163 
00164    memcpy( pixel, &colour, m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel );
00165    
00166    pixel += m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00167    maskpx += m_masksurface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00168   }
00169  }
00170  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_masksurface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_masksurface);
00171  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_surface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_surface);
00172 }
00173 
00174 void CSprite::applyTranslucency(Uint8 value)
00175 {
00176  Uint8 *pixel;
00177  Uint32 colour = 0;
00178  Uint8 r,g,b,a;
00179 
00180  r = g = b = a = 0;
00181 
00182  if(!m_surface) return;
00183 
00184  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_surface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_surface);
00185 
00186  pixel = (Uint8*)m_surface->pixels;
00187 
00188  for( Uint8 y=0 ; y<m_ysize ; y++ )
00189  {
00190   for( Uint8 x=0 ; x<m_xsize ; x++ )
00191   {
00192    memcpy( &colour, pixel, m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel );
00193 
00194    SDL_GetRGBA( colour, m_surface->format, &r, &g, &b, &a );
00195 
00196    if(a!=0) a = value;
00197 
00198    colour = SDL_MapRGBA( m_surface->format, r, g, b, a );
00199 
00200    memcpy( pixel, &colour, m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel );
00201 
00202    pixel += m_surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00203   }
00204  }
00205  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_surface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_surface);
00206 }

00211 void CSprite::setBouncingBoxCoordinates( Uint16 bboxx1, Uint16 bboxy1, Uint16 bboxx2, Uint16 bboxy2 )
00212 {
00213  m_bboxX1 = bboxx1;
00214  m_bboxY1 = bboxy1;
00215  m_bboxX2 = bboxx2;
00216  m_bboxY2 = bboxy2;

00219 void CSprite::copy( CSprite &Destination, SDL_Color *Palette )
00220 {
00221  Destination.m_bboxX1 = m_bboxX1;
00222  Destination.m_bboxY1 = m_bboxY1;
00223  Destination.m_bboxX2 = m_bboxX2;
00224  Destination.m_bboxY2 = m_bboxY2;
00225  Destination.setSize(m_xsize, m_ysize);
00226  
00227  Destination.createSurface( m_surface->flags, Palette );
00228  
00229  SDL_FillRect(Destination.getSDLSurface(), NULL, COLORKEY);
00230  SDL_BlitSurface( m_surface, NULL, Destination.getSDLSurface(), NULL);
00231 }
00232 
00233 // replaces all instances of color find in sprite s with
00234 // color replace, as long as the y is greater than miny
00235 // NOTE: This only can be used, when the surface is at 8-bit colours
00236 // and palettized. Don't use it, after it has been optimized
00237 void CSprite::replaceSpriteColor( Uint16 find, Uint16 replace, Uint16 miny )
00238 {
00239  Uint16 x,y;
00240  Uint8* pixel;
00241  
00242  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_surface)) SDL_LockSurface(m_surface);
00243  pixel = (Uint8*) m_surface->pixels;
00244  for(y=miny;y<m_ysize;y++)
00245  {
00246   for(x=0;x<m_xsize;x++)
00247   {
00248    if (pixel[y*m_xsize + x] ==find)
00249     pixel[y*m_xsize + x] = replace;
00250   }
00251  }
00252  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(m_surface)) SDL_UnlockSurface(m_surface);
00253 }
00254 
00255 void blitMaskedSprite(SDL_Surface *dst, SDL_Surface *src, Uint32 color)
00256 {
00257  Uint16 x,y;
00258  Uint32 *srcpixel, *dstpixel;
00259 
00260  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) SDL_LockSurface(dst);
00261  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(src)) SDL_LockSurface(src);
00262  dstpixel = (Uint32*) dst->pixels;
00263  srcpixel = (Uint32*) src->pixels;
00264  for(y=0;y<dst->h;y++)
00265  {
00266   for(x=0;x<dst->w;x++)
00267   {
00268    Uint8 r,g,b,a;
00269 
00270    SDL_GetRGBA(*srcpixel,src->format, &r, &g, &b, &a);
00271    SDL_GetRGB(color, src->format, &r, &g, &b);
00272    *dstpixel = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, r, g, b, a);
00273 
00274    dstpixel++;
00275    srcpixel++;
00276   }
00277  }
00278  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(src)) SDL_UnlockSurface(src);
00279  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
00280 }

00283 ///
00284 // Drawing Routines
00285 ///
00286 /**
00287  * \brief The function that blits the sprite to dst
00288  * \param SDL_Surface  Surface where the sprite will be drawn
00289  * \param x    X-Coordinate, indicating the position on dst
00290  * \param y    Y-Coordinate, indicating the position on dst
00291  */
00292 void CSprite::drawSprite( SDL_Surface *dst, Uint16 x, Uint16 y )
00293 {
00294  SDL_Rect dst_rect, src_rect;
00295  dst_rect.x = x;   dst_rect.y = y;
00296  dst_rect.w = m_xsize; dst_rect.h = m_ysize;
00297 
00298  src_rect.x = 0; src_rect.y = 0;
00299  src_rect.w = dst_rect.w;
00300  src_rect.h = dst_rect.h;
00301  
00302  SDL_BlitSurface( m_surface, &src_rect, dst, &dst_rect );
00303 }
00304 
00305 /**
00306  * \brief The function that blits the sprite to dst
00307  * \param SDL_Surface  Surface where the sprite will be drawn
00308  * \param x    X-Coordinate, indicating the position on dst
00309  * \param y    Y-Coordinate, indicating the position on dst
00310  */
00311 void CSprite::drawBlinkingSprite( SDL_Surface *dst, Uint16 x, Uint16 y )
00312 {
00313  SDL_Rect dst_rect, src_rect;
00314  dst_rect.x = x;   dst_rect.y = y;
00315  dst_rect.w = m_xsize; dst_rect.h = m_ysize;
00316 
00317  src_rect.x = 0; src_rect.y = 0;
00318  src_rect.w = dst_rect.w;
00319  src_rect.h = dst_rect.h;
00320 
00321  SDL_Surface *blanksfc = SDL_DisplayFormatAlpha(m_surface);
00322  blitMaskedSprite(blanksfc, m_surface, 0xFFFFFF);
00323  SDL_BlitSurface( blanksfc, &src_rect, dst, &dst_rect );
00324  SDL_FreeSurface(blanksfc);
00325 }

00328 void CSprite::freeSurfaces()
00329 {
00330  if(m_surface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_surface);
00331  m_surface = NULL;
00332  if(m_masksurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_masksurface);
00333  m_masksurface = NULL;
00334 }
00335 
00336 CSprite::~CSprite() {
00337  freeSurfaces();
00338 }
